Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: P. Shelkova "apaulinaria"
Reviews.Content: I travel a lot so this camera is perfect for me.  Awesome camera!  Mine was stolen recently so I'm buying another one of the same kind because this is such a good camera!  Compact size is great for travel and still takes fantastic pictures!  Even has a micro lens feature that can take pictures of the smallest bugs.  I use the MP3 player feature on long plane flights.  Battery lasts a really long time.  The only problem I experienced with the camera was when the lens cover wouldn't close.  I could of sent it in, but I realized that it was some little particle blocking the cover.  So I blew into the lens and voila!  It closed.  Also, like all Samsung products, the interface is very user friendly.  Highly recommended!

Reviews.Title: To me, completelly dissapointing
Reviews.Author: G. F. Rojas
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera and everything seemed to be OK, but after some 1000 pictures, suddenly stop working, and today is just junk in my desk... repairing it is more expensive than the money I paid for it.

Reviews.Title: A multimedia camera that does just about everything well, that seems to have never caught on...
Reviews.Author: John C. Bendheim
Reviews.Content: I gave this camera to my daughter and watched her have her creative adventures with it until she lost it.  I really think one of her acquaintances stole it.  I then bought the NV4, which is essentially the same camera with a little higher resolution.  This is a lot like an iPod that takes pics and videos.  A way cool camera that I think Samsung has discontinued...
